Data Structures

class  Example_2

Detailed Description

This example illustrates the way to send to MonALISA an UDP datagram with a single parameter, using the sendParameter() and sendTimedParameter() functions.

The number of parameters that will be sent can be specified in the command line (if it is not, the default is 20). For each parameter value two datagrams are sent: one with a timestamp and one without a timestamp. For the latter, the local time at the MonALISA host will be considered.
